title: Lemon and herb chicken breasts
ingredients: ['6 chicken breasts', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 lemons, zested and juiced', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat leaf parsley', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives']
